author: The Sun
title: Ground News - Gerrard's Saudi move turns into nightmare with Al-Ettifaq winless in two months
text:
Summary by The Sun STEVEN GERRARD ’S Saudi Arabia nightmare continued as his side conceded a last-minute equaliser to strugglers Al-Hazm. The former Aston Villa boss became manager of Al-Ettifaq in the summer. GettySteven Gerrard’s side are winless in two months[/caption] He brought several ex-Premier League stars with him including Jordan Henderson, Demarai Gray, Moussa Dembele and former Liverpool midfielder Georginio Wijnaldum. Gray opened the scoring for Al-Ett… Share menu More
